title: After Match Lobby Chat
body:
Are these taken into consideration when you report someone? I specifically said in my report to check those chat logs but I don't know if they will. A duo queue on my team took that opportunity to rage at me for a good 5 minutes. Apparently I didn't play well enough as a solo support blitz (smite teemo afk, check my match history). 

I just want to know if there are repercussions for what they did or they get off scott free.

replies.body:
I tend to post what they said in the chat in the report.

for example
Negative attitude
"gg ez"
You report people for saying "gg ez"? Grow a pair.

I'm not entirely sure but I assume they would. But might I suggest that for future tickets you submit screenshots as further evidence. 

Hope your problem is sorted and don't take their rage too personally. Everyone has bad games. A good player will be able to use those bad games to create good games and develop their skills.

Regards. 
Fog
